creator: neumann@karto.baug.ethz.ch
text:
In this example we use SVG fonts with a relative wide character bounding box. In Batik the glyphs are not 
properly aligned along the path.

Example:
http://www.carto.net/neumann/temp/textpathTest.svg

Screenshot of correct rendering (Opera9) and incorrect rendering (Batik SVN version)
http://www.carto.net/neumann/temp/textpathTest.png

creator: deweese@apache.org
text: This was fixed in SVN a little while ago.
